nodes.bodyText: Fix version number I'd missed in last PR.
dropped these down to the internal feature so that the client feature can reuse
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5,19 +5,17 @@ singleton=true
 IBM-App-ForceRestart: uninstall, \
  install
 IBM-ShortName: xmlWS-3.0
-IBM-API-Package: \

nodes.bodyText: Not sure why this bundle was importing this package, when it's only referenced by code in the com.ibm.ws.jaxws.tools bundle.

Created a new common-3.0 feature so that the client and server side features can share dependencies. I had to pull in the dependencies from the jaxws-2.3 and jaxrs-2.1internal com.ibm.websphere.appserver.cxf.internal-1.0(sp?) feature, since we no longer share an implementation with restfulWs-3.0
Since xmlWs-3.0 doesn't require support for Global Handler, I intend to remove the dependency on it, but in order to get the feature starting I've temporarily transformed the two artifacts above.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,64 @@

+symbolicName=io.openliberty.xmlws.common-3.0

nodes.bodyText: Yeah the transform won't fix the strings in the global handler function though because you didn't add anything for it, but if yo are going to remove it in xmlWS-3.0 it is a moot point.

nodes.bodyText: There appears to be nothing to transform here.
There appears to be nothing to transform here.
You may need to add a rule in direct properties for JAXWSCDIConstants with javax.enterprise.context to be converted.

I see you added something in the direct properties for the transformer.  It seems you left something though in the file javax.enterprise.context.Dependent.  Not sure if it is needed at all, but it will need to be fixed up or removed.
You removed the transform of the package that brought this in.  Do you also need to remove from here?

nodes.bodyText: To match 2.2 does the 2.3 common need to have ;start-phase:=CONTAINER_LATE

@@ -5,19 +5,17 @@ singleton=true

  install

 Subsystem-Name: Jakarta XML Web Services 3.0

 -features=\

nodes.bodyText: Should com.ibm.ws.webservices.javaee.common.jakarta only be in the xmlWS-3.0 and not the common?  It is not in jaxwsClient-2.2.
nodes.diffHunk:
